doc:
Melora Hardin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Melora_Hardin 0 Melora Diane Hardin (born June 29, 1967) is an American actress and singer, known for her roles as Jan Levinson on NBC's The Office and Trudy Monk on USA's Monk. More recently, Hardin appeared in a recurring role on Amazon's critically acclaimed series Transparent, for which she was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award. Melora_Diane_Hardin ( born June_29_,_1967 ) is an_American_actress_and_singer , known for her_roles as Jan_Levinson on NBC 's_The_Office_and_Trudy_Monk on USA 's_Monk . More_recently , Hardin appeared in a_recurring_role on Amazon 's critically_acclaimed series_Transparent , for which she was_nominated for a_Primetime_Emmy_Award .
